the great irritation of that stimulating Liquor

Another Argument of proof of what I
have Advanced concerning the force of the
Bile, may be taken from what is notoriously
observed in many old People of both
Sexes, for it is certain that all the Juices of
such are commonly ranker and more acrid
than in younger People, as appears by their
Spitle, Sweat, Urine, Fæces &c. And consequently
